snippet: Stephen Pelkofer scored 14 points, hitting four 3-pointers, and Wisconsin-Stevens Point won its fourth N.C.A.A. Division III men’s basketball championship with a 70-54 victory over Augustana in Salem, Va.
abstract: Wisconsin-Stevens Point defeats Augustana, 70-54, to win NCAA Division III men's basketball championship; other college basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Stephen Pelkofer scored 14 points, hitting four 3-pointers, and Wisconsin-Stevens Point won its fourth N.C.A.A. Division III men’s basketball championship with a 70-54 victory over Augustana in Salem, Va.

headline.main: Rout in Men’s Division III Championship Game
